subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
This character was affected by misreadings, or ''{{w|Youbian dubian}}''.

{{etystub|zh}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=yǔ
|m-s=yu3
|c=zeoi6,jyu4
|c_note=jyu4 - chiefly only used in {{zh-l|*大嶼山}}
|c-t=dui5
|h=pfs=yí;gd=yi3
|md=sê̤ṳ/ê̤ṳ/ṳ̄
|md_note=ê̤ṳ/ṳ̄ - misreadings
|mn=xm,tp,kh,mg,tc:sū/qz,lk:sǐr/zz,yl,tn:sī/sx,km,hc:sīr/xm:ú/qz:ír/zz:í
|mn_note=sū/sǐr/sī/sīr - vernacular; ú/ír/í - literary
|mn-t=se6
|w=3hhy
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}
